15B.F.summary: PT Semen Baturaja (Persero) Tbk produces and distributes cement in Indonesia. The company offers ordinary Portland cement type I, II, and V, as well as Portland composite cement. It also engages in the trading, construction, and land logistics businesses. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Palembang, Indonesia.

BEBS.JK.summary: PT Berkah Beton Sadaya, an industrial supporting infrastructure company, produces and sells ready-mix and precast concrete products. The company is based in Subang, Indonesia.

CTTH.JK.summary: PT Citatah Tbk manufactures and sells marble and marble handicrafts products in Indonesia. The company operates through Limestone and Imported Building Materials segments. Its products include slabs and tiles. The company also exports its products. PT Citatah Tbk was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Karawang, Indonesia.

HKMU.JK.summary: PT HK Metals Utama Tbk manufactures and trades in building and household materials in Indonesia. It offers stainless steel accessories, aluminum coated steel and coil machineries and spare parts, PVC pipes, light steel products, toilet and sanitary wares, and other household materials. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT HK Metals Utama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Hyamn Sukses Abadi.

IMPC.JK.summary: PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes building materials and plastic products in Indonesia and internationally. The company provides various roofing products, including polycarbonate, vinyl and vinyl composite, uPVC, and fiber reinforced polyester products; aluminum composite panels; sealants and adhesives; packaging products comprising corrugated PP sheet under the Impraboard brand name; and polymer resins, as well as rigid PVC compounds under the POLYVIC and CRYSTAL brands for use in blow molding, extrusion, and film and injection applications. It also develops and rents a business park in the Altira area. In addition, the company distributes plastic products, and adhesives materials or glue; and provides engineering, procurement, and construction services. PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

INTP.JK.summary: PT Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk manufactures and sells cement and ready mix concrete products in Indonesia and internationally. It operates in three segments: Cement, Ready-Mix Concrete, and Aggregates Quarries. The company offers Portland composite, ordinary Portland, Portland Pozzolan, oil well, white, and TR30 white mortar cement products under the Tiga Roda, Rajawali, and Duracem brands. It also involved in the aggregate and trass quarrying; and shipping activities, as well as provides labor supply services. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk is a subsidiary of Birchwood Omnia Limited.

ITP.F.summary: PT Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk manufactures and sells cement and ready mix concrete products in Indonesia and internationally. It operates in three segments: Cement, Ready-Mix Concrete, and Aggregates Quarries. The company offers Portland composite, ordinary Portland, Portland Pozzolan, oil well, white, and TR30 white mortar cement products under the Tiga Roda, Rajawali, and Duracem brands. It also involved in the aggregate and trass quarrying; and shipping activities, as well as provides labor supply services. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk is a subsidiary of Birchwood Omnia Limited.

PITPY.summary: PT Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk manufactures and sells cement and ready mix concrete products in Indonesia and internationally. It operates in three segments: Cement, Ready-Mix Concrete, and Aggregates Quarries. The company offers Portland composite, ordinary Portland, Portland Pozzolan, oil well, white, and TR30 white mortar cement products under the Tiga Roda, Rajawali, and Duracem brands. It also involved in the aggregate and trass quarrying; and shipping activities, as well as provides labor supply services. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk is a subsidiary of Birchwood Omnia Limited.

PSGTF.summary: PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, packs, and distributes cement in Indonesia and internationally. The company is also involved in limestone and clay mining; cement bag and material manufacturing; industrial real estate development and building rental; ready mix concrete production; and mining, trading, transportation, and construction activities. In addition, it engages in the information system, investment, freight forwarding, general trading, stevedoring, sea transportation, and building materials businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Semen Gresik (Persero) Tbk and changed its name to PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk in January 2013. PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

PSGTY.summary: PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, packs, and distributes cement in Indonesia and internationally. The company is also involved in limestone and clay mining; cement bag and material manufacturing; industrial real estate development and building rental; ready mix concrete production; and mining, trading, transportation, and construction activities. In addition, it engages in the information system, investment, freight forwarding, general trading, stevedoring, sea transportation, and building materials businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Semen Gresik (Persero) Tbk and changed its name to PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk in January 2013. PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

RU6.F.summary: PT Solusi Bangun Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes cement, ready-mixed concrete, and aggregates in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Cement, Readymix Concrete and Aggregates Quarry, and Other Construction Services. It offers cement and mortar, as well as coarse, fine, and other aggregates. The company also provides construction and consulting services. In addition, it engages in the licensing of aggregates quarry and mining production; and mining activities, as well as provides waste management service for industrial companies. The company was formerly known as PT Holcim Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT Solusi Bangun Indonesia Tbk in March 2019. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Solusi Bangun Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Semen Indonesia Industri Bangunan.

SMBR.JK.summary: PT Semen Baturaja (Persero) Tbk produces and distributes cement in Indonesia. The company offers ordinary Portland cement type I, II, and V, as well as Portland composite cement. It also engages in the trading, construction, and land logistics businesses. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Palembang, Indonesia.

SMCB.JK.summary: PT Solusi Bangun Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes cement, ready-mixed concrete, and aggregates in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Cement, Readymix Concrete and Aggregates Quarry, and Other Construction Services. It offers cement and mortar, as well as coarse, fine, and other aggregates. The company also provides construction and consulting services. In addition, it engages in the licensing of aggregates quarry and mining production; and mining activities, as well as provides waste management service for industrial companies. The company was formerly known as PT Holcim Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT Solusi Bangun Indonesia Tbk in March 2019. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Solusi Bangun Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Semen Indonesia Industri Bangunan.

SMGR.JK.summary: PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, packs, and distributes cement in Indonesia and internationally. The company is also involved in limestone and clay mining; cement bag and material manufacturing; industrial real estate development and building rental; ready mix concrete production; and mining, trading, transportation, and construction activities. In addition, it engages in the information system, investment, freight forwarding, general trading, stevedoring, sea transportation, and building materials businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Semen Gresik (Persero) Tbk and changed its name to PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk in January 2013. PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

SMS2.F.summary: PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, packs, and distributes cement in Indonesia and internationally. The company is also involved in limestone and clay mining; cement bag and material manufacturing; industrial real estate development and building rental; ready mix concrete production; and mining, trading, transportation, and construction activities. In addition, it engages in the information system, investment, freight forwarding, general trading, stevedoring, sea transportation, and building materials businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Semen Gresik (Persero) Tbk and changed its name to PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk in January 2013. PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

WK0.F.summary: PT Wijaya Karya Beton Tbk manufactures and sells pre-stressed concrete (PC) products in Indonesia. The company offers concrete poles; piles, rounded hollow poles, poles hollow boxes, and cylinder piles; concrete pipe products; PC piles, such as spun, triangle, square hollow, and solid square piles; and railway concrete products, such as railway sleepers, poles, and bridges. It also provides bridge concrete products comprising girder, voided slab, double tee, full depth slab, and half slab concrete products; retaining wall concrete products, such as corrugated, flat prestressed, and flat reinforced concrete sheet piles; maritime concrete products including breakwater and dock components; hydro concrete products; building concrete products, which consists of precast walls, hollow core slabs, concrete slabs, columns, blocks, stairs, beams, and ladders; and ready-mix concrete. In addition, the company engages in the mining and production of split, screen material, etc.; engineering, production, and installation businesses; and provision of patent, inner bore system installation, gantry, and post tensioning services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Wijaya Karya Beton Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk.

WSBP.JK.summary: PT Waskita Beton Precast Tbk manufactures precast, ready mix concrete, and quarry. It operates through three segments: Precast, Ready Mix, and Construction Service. The company provides girders, spun and square piles, concrete barriers, U-gutter, U-ditch, box culverts, diaphragm wall, spider web foundation, CCSP and FCSP, pier head precast, electric pole, railway sleeper, sprigWP, RC pipe, and tetrapod products, as well as full, half, deck, and voided slabs. It also offers supporting services comprising engineering, installation, piling, construction, and post-tensioning services. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia. PT Waskita Beton Precast Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Waskita Karya (Persero) Tbk.

WTON.JK.summary: PT Wijaya Karya Beton Tbk manufactures and sells pre-stressed concrete (PC) products in Indonesia. The company offers concrete poles; piles, rounded hollow poles, poles hollow boxes, and cylinder piles; concrete pipe products; PC piles, such as spun, triangle, square hollow, and solid square piles; and railway concrete products, such as railway sleepers, poles, and bridges. It also provides bridge concrete products comprising girder, voided slab, double tee, full depth slab, and half slab concrete products; retaining wall concrete products, such as corrugated, flat prestressed, and flat reinforced concrete sheet piles; maritime concrete products including breakwater and dock components; hydro concrete products; building concrete products, which consists of precast walls, hollow core slabs, concrete slabs, columns, blocks, stairs, beams, and ladders; and ready-mix concrete. In addition, the company engages in the mining and production of split, screen material, etc.; engineering, production, and installation businesses; and provision of patent, inner bore system installation, gantry, and post tensioning services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Wijaya Karya Beton Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk.
